column4: Uncategorized;Preah Sihanouk –------  On the afternoon of October 11
column6: two Chinese men were arrested in connection with the ------failed kidnap and killing------ of another Chinese male in a car on October 6.------Forces also recovered a handgun
column7: which is thought to have been used in the murder. ------A ------male and female Chinese national were arrested------ after the incident
column8: while the two suspects arrested today manged to escape. However
column9: authorities have not yet confirmed the full details. ------CHNC
